TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed RelayEventSubscriberAuthenticationType extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Describes whether subscribers to a are required to present a security token issued by the Azure Access Control service to the Azure Service Bus service when sending messages.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.ServiceBus.RelayEventSubscriberAuthenticationType None = int32(1)

Docs.summary: If specified by a NetEventRelay subscriber, the client will not be required to provide a relay access token. This represents an opt-out mechanism with which listeners can waive the Azure Access Control protection on the endpoint and perform their own access control.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.ServiceBus.RelayEventSubscriberAuthenticationType RelayAccessToken = int32(0)

Docs.summary: If specified by a NetEventRelay listener, the client is required to provide a relay access token.
